directions.text: Roughly process almonds and toast in a skillet for about 3 mins.
Process almonds, garlic, basil, ¼ tsp salt, pepper, and olive oil until smooth.
Add romano cheese and butter to processor and process for 10 secs.
Scrape sides of processor and process for a 3 more secs.
Boil linguine in water along with 1 tsp salt, and save 1 TBSP pasta water when drained.
Toss pasta, reserved water and pesto together.
